overview: Qatayef's daughter, Samara, dreams of a life other than that of her mother. She wants luxury and a life of extravagance. Rabih, the driver of Bey, Mohsen, who claims that he is Mohsen Bey, is well-known, so Katayev is the daughter of Bakir Pasha, the owner of the Grand Palace. "Mohsen Bey" who is "Spring" and the ceremony begins already only to It comes as the family of "good" preacher "Amany" daughter Bakir Pasha. After many comical circumstances the truth becomes clear and the driver knows that she is not the daughter of Basha. Katayev envisions that her plan has been corrupted and that the marriage of the rich has failed in turn.
title: على أد لحافك
